The St. Regis Doha Wins A Line oF International And Regional Accolades
The ST. Regis Doha, The Finest Address in Qatar, received nine prestigious awards from industry leaders. The awards recognized ST. Regis’ excellence in design, market leadership, dining experience, travel and luxury.
For a third year in a row, The World Travel Awards named The ST. Regis Doha as ‘Qatar’s Best Leading Resort 2015’. The hotel’s presidential suite also received this year’s award for ‘Leading Hotel Suite’. The World Travel Awards is ranked among the industry’s top awards that celebrate organizations that continue to push the boundaries of industry excellence. Travel and tourism industry professionals gathered in Dubai last month for the highly anticipated award ceremony.
The ST. Regis Doha’s dining experience and offerings continue to get recognized for their fine taste and wide offerings. Qatar’s Fact Magazine named Opal by Gordon Ramsay as The Best contemporary European Restaurants”, while Vine received the award for Best Friday Brunch” and Hakkasan Doha won in the “Best Chinese Restaurant” category.
In addition, Hakkasan Doha also won “Best Chinese Restaurant” for most authentic Far East offerings and was named “Best Restaurant of the Year” for 2015 by Time Out Doha Magazine. Sarab Louge was highly commended in the “Best Afternoon Tea” category, while Vine and Opal by Gordon Ramsay were highly commended in the “Best Friday Brunch” and the “The Best contemporary European Restaurants” categories respectively.
These accolades reflect the ST. Regis Hotel’s standards of service and hotel management; in addition, to high guest satisfaction. These not to mention, their dedication to continue to build up on the St. Regis legacy for hotel management and hospitality excellence.
Commenting on the latest awards, Mr. Tareq Derbas, General Manager of The ST. Regis Doha said “We are very honoured with the line-up of awards that we have received. I want to thank our remarkable management team and staff who have contributed significantly to the hotel’s accomplishments. We are very proud of all of the success we have achieved and we will continue to deliver our promise of being ‘ The Finest Address in Qatar.’ ”
With exceptional luxurious spaces and timeless sophistication, the ST. Regis Doha continues to remain a benchmark in the hospitality sector. The ST. Regis Doha is a renowned destination for luxury and travel in Qatar and around the world.
Source:- Regis Hotel
